Package io.github.akjo03.util.math.unit

Interface Unit<T extends Unit<T>>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of unit.
All Known Subinterfaces:
BaseUnit<T>, DerivedUnit<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AccelerationUnit, AreaUnit, LengthUnit, MassUnit, SpeedUnit, TimeUnit, VolumeUnit
public interface Unit<T extends Unit<T>>
Defines a unit of measurement. Two interfaces extend this interface: BaseUnit and DerivedUnit.

    • getConversionFactor

      @NotNull @NotNull BigDecimal getConversionFactor(@NotNull T unit)
      Gets the conversion factor from this unit to the given unit.
      Parameters:
      unit - The unit to convert to.
      Returns:
      The conversion factor.

    • getLocalizedNames

      @NotNull @NotNull Map<Locale,StringArr2> getLocalizedNames()
      Returns:
      A list of translations for the name this unit. The locale is the key and the value is an array of two strings. The first string is the singular form of the unit and the second string is the plural form.

    • getDefaultName

      @NotNull @NotNull StringArr2 getDefaultName()
      Returns:
      The default name of this unit.

    • getLocalizedAbbreviations

      @NotNull @NotNull Map<Locale,String> getLocalizedAbbreviations()
      Returns:
      A list of translations for the abbreviation of this unit. The locale is the key and the value is the abbreviation.

    • getDefaultAbbreviation

      @NotNull @NotNull String getDefaultAbbreviation()
      Returns:
      The default abbreviation for this unit.

    • getLocalizedName

      @NotNull default @NotNull StringArr2 getLocalizedName(Locale locale)
      Parameters:
      locale - The locale to get the name for.
      Returns:
      The name of this unit in the given locale.

    • getLocalizedAbbreviation

      @NotNull default @NotNull String getLocalizedAbbreviation(Locale locale)
      Parameters:

    • getUnitSystem

      @NotNull @NotNull UnitSystem getUnitSystem()
